WorkItem.Description:
Hello...
 
I am trying to set named ranges using Excel5, but they aren't being displayed at all....
 
help me plz!
 
thanks.
 
---------
EDIT (koyama):
 
Named Ranges not working with Excel5
>> Named Ranges not working with PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
 
Test:
----
$excel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load('read.xls');
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'Excel5');
$writer->save('write.xls');
 
Expected result:
-----
Named ranges in read.xls are still there in write.xls
 
Screenshot from read.xls showing 2 named ranges:
http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/3397/ss20100110082653.png
 
Actual result:
-----
Named ranges missing in write.xls
 
Screenshot from write.xls showing 0 named ranges:
http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/7214/ss20100110082814.png
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.1
WorkItem.Summary: Named Ranges not working with PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message:
Fixing this in SVN.

Note that names in *formulas* still don't work with Excel5 writer. That has not been addressed here, but here:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7895
